p: The mycelial growth of blueberry pathogens was inhibited by at least one of the extracts from the plants under study. In the case of the treatments with L. hirta, the extract M5L (at a concentration of 5 mg/mL) inhibited 100% of the growth of P. clavispora and C. gloeosporioides, the same results obtained with the positive controls ( Figure 1(A1,A2,E1,E2), Table 1).
